ResearchProjectDef.label: tranquilizers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the production of tranquilizers or other non-lethal weapons to temporarily inhibit some SCPs in order to further contain them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic containment crate
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of specialized, powered containment vessels for all different kinds of SCPs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced containment crate
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of more advanced containment vessels for the harder to contain SCPs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: steel reinforced walls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of concrete walls strengthened with steel rebar. Keeps some SCPs contained.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasteel reinforced walls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of concrete walls strengthened with plasteel rebar. Keeps most SCPs contained.

ResearchProjectDef.label: security doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of reinforced doors to prevent SCPs from escaping containment whilst powered.

ResearchProjectDef.label: blast doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of strong blast doors to prevent SCPs from escaping containment, even without power to the doors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: foundation personnel apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: craft useful researching gear often worn by SCP Foundation personnel. Includes glasses, lab coat, and a suit jacket.

ResearchProjectDef.label: simple insignia helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create simple helmets with faction insignias on them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Global Occult Coalition suits
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create the suits the GOC frequently fields. Includes the Black Suit and the Grey Suit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Global Occult Coalition advanced suits
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create the suits the GOC is proud to arm its soldiers with. Includes the White Suit and helmet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chaos Insurgency gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create the gear the Chaos Insurgency frequently fields. Includes the gas mask and the military vest.
